item.title: Yet Another Getting Started With Hugo Post
item.description: Install hugo PS C:\matt> choco install hugo -confirm Output Chocolatey v0.10.15 [Pending] Removing incomplete install for 'hugo' Installing the following packages: hugo By installing you accept licenses for the packages. hugo v0.62.1 [Approved] hugo package files install completed. Performing other installation steps.
